Christina,



As I noted via text message Jennifer promised to get the loan into
underwriting which she did, there are also turn around times for

Morning Brenda! Ok, so the answer is Yes we can pay AZ 1099. Arizona
mortgage lenders are not prevented by law from employing loan originators
as independent contractors and compensating them in ways other than the
typical W-2 format.



"Arizona mortgage laws do not prohibit AZ Mortgage Lenders from employing
and compensating Arizona-licensed loan originators as independent
contractors"



And,



"A.R.S. Title 6, Chapter 9 supports the conclusion that an AZ Mortgage
Lender can compensate loans originators through means other than an IRS W-2
Form."
